info.name: Moonify FT DeepDark
info.description: Modifies the FT DeepDark theme for Firefox to make it integrate better with Pale Moon.
info.additionalInfo: Requires FT DeepDark version 9.4.1. v1.1 - Pale Moon 26 compatibility v1.0 - initial release

data.title: Caption Bar Icons Issue with Windows 10
Broken as of Pale Moon v27.0.1
